Lyric:
[ti:may rain]
[ar:窦靖童]
[al:may rain]
[by:菜籽酱]
[00:16.180]May says that she doesn't love me no more
[00:24.520]May says that we are now over over over over
[00:32.770]Guess I’ll just leave, you can keep the keys
[00:40.850]Bye now I’ll be seeing you never never never never
[00:45.810]
[00:49.660]We had our highs and we had our lows
[00:52.480]But now you say I need to go
[00:57.510]
[00:58.000]It’s a storm and I’m getting cold
[01:01.350]can’t stay here anymore
[01:05.090]
[01:05.490]Our shadow’s bound to separate
[01:09.510]Won’t cry no, just pack my things
[01:13.580]I’ll go now, leave behind your shame
[01:17.530]
[01:17.900]Close up and lock this gate
[01:22.070]Goodbye to this may rain
[01:26.170]
[01:43.250]I was never one to believe in fate
[01:51.160]But I thought that we were forever ever ever ever
[01:59.560]Then sun turns to rain I start hiding away
[02:07.650]And now you’re walking out with no see you later later later
[02:12.700]
[02:16.580]We had our highs and we had our lows
[02:19.570]But now you say I need to go
[02:24.450]
[02:24.870]It’s a storm and I’m getting cold
[02:28.050]can’t stay here anymore
[02:31.980]
[02:32.380]Our shadow’s bound to separate
[02:36.410]Won’t cry no, just pack my things
[02:40.490]I’ll go now, leave behind your shame
[02:44.690]Close up and lock this gate
[02:48.420]
[02:48.840]Our shadow’s bound to separate
[02:52.910]Won’t cry no, just pack my things
[02:57.010]I’ll go now, leave behind your shame
[03:01.210]Close up and lock this gate
[03:05.060]
[03:05.450]Goodbye to this may rain
[03:09.820]
